actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Solvency Act of 1983 to provide a 3-year extension of the transfer of revenues attributable to taxation of tier 2 benefits to the Railroad Retirement Account.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Solvency Act of 1983 to extend for three years provisions for the transfer of tier 2 railroad retirement benefit taxation revenues from the general fund of the Treasury to the Railroad Retirement Account.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Solvency Act of 1983 to provide a 3-year extension of the transfer of revenues attributable to taxation of tier 2 benefits to the Railroad Retirement Account.
